articles.description: Flea recalled the Red Hot Chili Peppers' arrogance that led to petty attitude to Guns N' Roses and other '80s bands in March 2022.
articles.content:
Red Hot Chili Peppers bassist Flea expressed regret over his band’s attitude to other groups who were trying to find fame in the ‘80s.
He said he and his colleagues had fostered a “certain arrogance… [+1461 chars]
